title: DAVOS TODAY: Trump visit 'a distraction' - Davos co-chair
text:
DAVOS TODAY: Trump visit 'a distraction' - Davos co-chair Tuesday, January 23, 2018 - 01:40 
Sharan Burrow, a co-chair of the Davos World Economic Forum and General Secretary of the ITUC, tells Reuters' Axel Threlfall that U.S. President Donald Trump's ''America First'' message flies against the event's spirit of cooperation.   
Sharan Burrow, a co-chair of the Davos World Economic Forum and General Secretary of the ITUC, tells Reuters' Axel Threlfall that U.S. President Donald Trump's "America First" message flies against the event's spirit of cooperation.  //reut.rs/2n42Ntv
